text:
Good ambients and location, direct opposite MBS.

No much comments on foods, as my suit for me.. But the soup is delicious.

Celebrated my wife birthday with a wonderful feast at the monti. Thanks to the awesome recommendation and hospitality provided by Seraj and team. Big thumbs up for the service, the food, the view and the overall experience.

Very uptown and cozy place. Was here for a wedding. Breathtaking scenery of the Singapore dream on the side and the braised beef short ribs is a perfect combination. Separable streaks of meat that melts in ur mouth is truly one of the best I had

The food was pretty good, and the live music was great. The view is really nice as well.

They overcharged us for a drink though and brought us fries we didn't ask for which they charged us for. It was too cold in the restaurant as well.

Overall it was an okay experience. In glad we went, but I won't go there again.

High end Italian taste above the sea.. ideal enviroment for young and old.. Birthday party... Reunion dinner.. moderate wedding dinner... with bar within the hall.. good recepis served... good services
